snippet: Thousands of Polish labor union members marched through Warsaw to protest against government labor policy and overhauls to the pension system, and to demand higher pay.
abstract: Thousands of Polish labor union members march through Warsaw, sounding sirens and throwing smoke grenades to protest against government labor policy and overhauls to the pension system, and to demand higher pay.
lead_paragraph: Thousands of Polish labor union members marched through Warsaw to protest against government labor policy and overhauls to the pension system, and to demand higher pay.

headline.main: Poland: Workers Stage Protest as Economy Slows
headline.print_headline: Poland: Workers Stage Protest as Economy Slows
